info.title: Update a User
info.description: Updates information for an existing user within your Fivetran account.

operation.description: Updates information for an existing user within your Fivetran account.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user within the account.

id.description: The unique identifier for the group within the Fivetran system.

email.description: The email address that the user has associated with their user profile.

verified.description: The field indicates whether the user has verified their email address in the account creation process.

invited.description: The field indicates whether the user has been invited to your account.

picture.description: The user's avatar as a URL link (for example, 'http://mycompany.com/avatars/john_white.png') or base64 data URI (for example, 'data:image/png;base64,aHR0cDovL215Y29tcGFueS5jb20vYXZhdGFycy9qb2huX3doaXRlLnBuZw==')

phone.description: The phone number of the user.

role.description: The group role that you would like to assign this new user to. Supported group roles: ‘Manage Destination‘, ‘View Destination‘, ‘Edit Destination‘, ‘Create Connection‘, or a custom destination role

active.description: The boolean value indicating the user's status. If the user is able to log in, the value is true. If the user's account has been suspended, the value is false

given_name.description: The first name of the user.

created_at.description: The timestamp of when the group was created in your account.

family_name.description: The last name of the user.

logged_in_at.description: The last time that the user has logged into their Fivetran account.

phone.description: The phone number of the user.

picture.description: The user's avatar as a URL link (for example, 'http://mycompany.com/avatars/john_white.png') or base64 data URI (for example, 'data:image/png;base64,aHR0cDovL215Y29tcGFueS5jb20vYXZhdGFycy9qb2huX3doaXRlLnBuZw==')

role.description: The account role that you would like to assign to the user. You cannot change your own role.

family_name.description: The last name of the user.

given_name.description: The first name of the user.
